CURRENT_DAY.description: Text for tooltip shown when a user hovers over the calendar day which is the same as 'Today'

END_DATE_ARIA_LABEL.description: Aria label details for selected end date

MONTH_SELECTOR_TOOLTIP.description: Text for tooltip shown when a user hovers over the control used to select the month, within the datepicker component/control

NEXT_MONTH_ARIA_LABEL.description: Label for the calendar next month

PREVIOUS_MONTH_ARIA_LABEL.description: Label for the calendar previous month

SELECTED_ARIA_LABEL.description: Aria label details for selected date

SELECTED_DAY.description: Text for tooltip shown when a user hovers over the calenday which has been selected/choosen

START_DATE_ARIA_LABEL.description: Aria label details for selected start date

YEAR_SELECTOR_TOOLTIP.description: Text for tooltip shown when a user hovers over the control used to select the year, within the datepicker component/control

FIRST_SLIDE_MESSAGE.description: Text inserted into live aria region when reaching first slide

LAST_SLIDE_MESSAGE.description: Text inserted into live aria region when reaching last slide

NEXT_SLIDE_MESSAGE.description: Aria label for next slide navigation button

PAGE_CHANGE.description: Text to be read when changing pages by navigation, {{index}} is replaced with exact number of slides

PAGINATION_BULLET_MESSAGE.description: Aria label of each pagination bullet element. {{index}} is replaced with exact number of slides

PAGINATION_LABEL.description: Aria label used to tell users using assistive technology which slide they are on and how many slides exist in the control

PREV_SLIDE_MESSAGE.description: Aria label for previous slide navigation button

CAROUSEL.description: You can use a carousel in scenarios such as slideshows, galleries, onboarding flows, and presentations.

ERROR.description: The text 'Required Selection' in the checkbox-group

DESELECT_ALL.description: Dropdown options when multiple pages - deselect

SELECTION_LABEL.description: Set the text in the selected label at header

SELECT_ALL.description: Dropdown options when multiple pages - all

SELECT_ALL_ON_PAGE.description: Dropdown options when multiple pages - all on page

DAY_ARIA_LABEL.description: Label for the day input text

INPUT_ARIA_LABEL.description: Label for the date input text

MONTH_ARIA_LABEL.description: Label for the month input text

YEAR_ARIA_LABEL.description: Label for the year input text

CLEAR_LABEL.description: Label for the date picker clear button

DATE_LABEL.description: Label for the date input in date picker

DAY_AND_MONTH_MISSING.description: Error message for missing day and month on the date range picker date
DAY_AND_MONTH_MISSING.message: The date must include a day and a month.

DAY_AND_YEAR_MISSING.description: Error message for missing day and year on the date range picker date
DAY_AND_YEAR_MISSING.message: The date must include a day and a year.

DAY_MISSING.description: Error message for missing day on the date range picker start date
DAY_MISSING.message: The date must include a day.

DONE_DATE_SELECTED_LABEL.description: Label for the date picker's done button when a date is selected. Appends to the label for the button. Example 'Done, selected date is 01/01/2000'

DONE_ENDDATE_SELECTED_LABEL.description: Label for the date picker's done button when an end date is selected. Appends to the label for the button. Example 'Done, selected start date is January 15, 2020, selected end date is January 25, 2020'

DONE_LABEL.description: Label for the done button in date range picker

DONE_NO_DATE_LABEL.description: Label for the date picker's done button when no date is selected. Example 'Done, no date selected'

DONE_STARTDATE_SELECTED_LABEL.description: Label for the date picker's done button when a start date is selected. Example 'Done, selected start date is January 15, 2020

END_DATE_LABEL.description: Label for the end date in date range picker

INVALID_DATE.description: Error for when date is invalid. Happens when the given date is out of range or formatted incorrectly.
INVALID_DATE.message: The date must be a valid date.

INVALID_YEAR_LENGTH.description: Error message for invalid year length on the date range picker start date
INVALID_YEAR_LENGTH.message: The date year must have 4 digits.

MISSING_VALUE.description: Error for when date is missing. Appears if user attempts to submit without entering a date.

MONTH_AND_YEAR_MISSING.description: Error message for missing month and year on the date range picker date
MONTH_AND_YEAR_MISSING.message: The date must include a month and a year.

MONTH_ARIA_LABEL.description: Label for the date picker month

MONTH_MISSING.description: Error message for missing month on the date range picker date
MONTH_MISSING.message: The date must include a month.

MONTH_NAVIGATION_ARIA_LABEL.description: Label for the date picker month navigation toolbar button group. This group contains the select controls allowing the user to navigate to either the previous or next month within the date picker

MONTH_YEAR_ARIA_LABEL.description: Label for the date picker month toolbar button group. This group contains the select controls allowing the user to change the month or year within the date picker

NEXT_MONTH_ARIA_LABEL.description: Label for the date picker next month

OPEN_CALENDAR.description: Label for the date picker's button. This is shown as an calendar icon.

PREVIOUS_MONTH_ARIA_LABEL.description: Label for the date picker previous month

START_DATE_LABEL.description: Label for the start date in date range picker

TODAY_LABEL.description: Label for the Today button in date range picker

TODAY_TOOLTIP.description: Text for tooltip shown when the user hovers over the button, which will switch the datepicker to displaying the month with today's date in it

YEAR_ARIA_LABEL.description: Label for the date picker year

YEAR_MISSING.description: Error message for missing year on the date range picker date
YEAR_MISSING.message: The date must include a year.

END_DAY_AND_MONTH_MISSING.description: Error message for missing day and month on the date range picker end date. Similar to other date picker messaging
END_DAY_AND_MONTH_MISSING.message: The end date must include a day and a month.

END_DAY_AND_YEAR_MISSING.description: Error message for missing day and year on the date range picker end date. Similar to other date picker messaging
END_DAY_AND_YEAR_MISSING.message: The end date must include a day and a year.

END_DAY_MISSING.description: Error message for missing day on the date range picker end date. Similar to other date picker messaging
END_DAY_MISSING.message: The end date must include a day.

END_END_DATE_BEFORE_START_DATE.description: Error message for when the selected end date is before the selected start date
END_END_DATE_BEFORE_START_DATE.message: The end date must be the same as or later than {{- start_date}}.

END_INPUT_ARIA_LABEL.description: Label for the date range picker end date

END_INVALID_DATE.description: Error message for invalid date format on the date range picker end date. Similar to other date picker messaging
END_INVALID_DATE.message: The end date must be a real date.

END_INVALID_YEAR_LENGTH.description: Error message for invalid year length on the date range picker end date. Similar to other date picker messaging
END_INVALID_YEAR_LENGTH.message: The end date year must have 4 digits.

END_MISSING_VALUE.description: Error message for when the end date is missing a required value. This type of message is used for any required field.

END_MONTH_AND_YEAR_MISSING.description: Error message for missing month and year on the date range picker end date. Similar to other date picker messaging
END_MONTH_AND_YEAR_MISSING.message: The end date must include a month and a year.

END_MONTH_MISSING.description: Error message for missing month on the date range picker end date. Similar to other date picker messaging
END_MONTH_MISSING.message: The end date must include a month.

END_YEAR_MISSING.description: Error message for missing year on the date range picker end date. Similar to other date picker messaging
END_YEAR_MISSING.message: The end date must include a year.

OPEN_CALENDAR.description: Label for the date range picker's button. Similar to the label for the single date picker open button.

START_DAY_AND_MONTH_MISSING.description: Error message for missing day and month on the date range picker start date. Similar to other date picker messaging
START_DAY_AND_MONTH_MISSING.message: The start date must include a day and a month.

START_DAY_AND_YEAR_MISSING.description: Error message for missing day and year on the date range picker start date. Similar to other date picker messaging
START_DAY_AND_YEAR_MISSING.message: The start date must include a day and a year.

START_DAY_MISSING.description: Error message for missing day on the date range picker start date. Similar to other date picker messaging
START_DAY_MISSING.message: The start date must include a day.

START_INPUT_ARIA_LABEL.description: Label for the date range picker start date

START_INVALID_DATE.description: Error message for invalid date format on the date range picker start date. Similar to other date picker messaging
START_INVALID_DATE.message: The start date must be a real date.

START_INVALID_YEAR_LENGTH.description: Error message for invalid year length on the date range picker start date. Similar to other date picker messaging
START_INVALID_YEAR_LENGTH.message: The start date year must have 4 digits.

START_MISSING_VALUE.description: Error message for when the start date is missing a required value. Similar to other date picker messaging

START_MONTH_AND_YEAR_MISSING.description: Error message for missing month and year on the date range picker start date. Similar to other date picker messaging
START_MONTH_AND_YEAR_MISSING.message: The start date must include a month and a year.

START_MONTH_MISSING.description: Error message for missing month on the date range picker start date. Similar to other date picker messaging
START_MONTH_MISSING.message: The start date must include a month.

START_YEAR_MISSING.description: Error message for missing year on the date range picker start date. Similar to other date picker messaging
START_YEAR_MISSING.message: The start date must include a year.

CLOSE_BUTTON_TEXT.description: Tool tip text for close button on Header

CONTENT.description: Aria label for the content area

DOWNLOAD_LABEL.description: Aria label for the download button

EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION.description: Label to guide screen reader users towards extended description

FOCUSED_PAGE_NUMBER_LABEL.description: Aria label for the focused page number input

FULL_SCREEN_LABEL.description: Aria label for the full screen button

NEXT_PAGE_LABEL.description: Aria label for the next page button

OF.description: Preposition between focused page number input and total number of pages

PAGE.description: Word for page in alternative text

PREV_PAGE_LABEL.description: Aria label for the previous page button

PRINT_LABEL.description: Aria label for the print button

SEND_LABEL.description: Aria label for the send button

SIDEBAR_LABEL.description: Aria label for the toggle button of the document's thumbnails list

SUMMARY.description: Aria label for the sidebar toolbar

ZOOM_IN_LABEL.description: Aria label for the zoom in button

ZOOM_LEVEL_LABEL.description: Aria label for the zoom level select

ZOOM_OUT_LABEL.description: Aria label for the zoom out button

DRAG_AND_DROP.description: Invit to drag and drop or [browse a file]

FILES_ADDED.description: Vocalized message when several files are added

FILES_CLEARED.description: Vocalized message when files are cleared

FILE_ADDED.description: Vocalized message when a file is added

READ_ONLY.description: Label for the read only icon

OPTIONS_STRING.description: Options string to display number of options in menu.

POPOVER_LABEL.description: Aria label describing the menu of options shown, after a user types in text into the autocomplete combobox

ALPHABETICAL_SORTING.description: Aria Label for alphabetical sorting in the main navigation menu options. This option will allow users to sort the items within the (main) left nav alphabetically

ARIA_LABEL.description: Aria Label for main navigation drawer

BACK_BUTTON_TEXT.description: Tool tip text for back button on Header

BUTTON_TEXT.description: Tool tip text for menu button

CLOSE_BUTTON_TEXT.description: Tool tip text for close button on Header

COLLAPSE_NAVIGATION.description: Collapse all accordion items in the navigation menu

COMPACT_VIEW_NAVIGATION.description: layout option for the menu compact view

DEFAULT_SORTING.description: Aria Label for default sorting in the main navigation menu options. This option will allow users to sort the items within the (main) normally, as the domain/admin sets them.

EXPAND_NAVIGATION.description: Expand all accordion items in the navigation menu

NAVIGATION_ITEMS.description: label for the options menu to modify the navigation items

NAVIGATION_LAYOUT.description: label for the options menu to modify the navigation layout

NAVIGATION_OPTIONS.description: the options menu for the side navigation

STANDARD_VIEW_NAVIGATION.description: layout option for the menu standard view

FIRST_PAGE.description: The aria label for the first page button. Clicking/tapping this button takes the user to the first page of the data set

LAST_PAGE.description: The aria label for the last page button. Clicking/tapping this button takes the user to the last page of the data set.

NEXT_PAGE.description: the aria label for the next page button

PAGE_MENU_ARIALABEL.description: Aria label for the menu allowing the user to select how many items they wish to see per page.

PAGE_OF.description: The text 'Page {currentPage} of {totalPages}' in paginator. This help quantify which page the user is on within the data set and how many pages exist in total

PER_PAGE.description: The text 'per page' in paginator. This helps to quantify how many items are shown on a given page within the data table

PREV_PAGE.description: The aria label for the previous page button. Clicking this button allows the user to go one page backwards within the data set

ROW_OPTIONS.description: the aria label for the row options button

SHOWING_ALL.description: The text 'Showing all' in paginator. Choosing this option allows the user to see all the items within the data set on a single page. This should be user raely and only when the number of items is not large.

TOTAL_ITEMS.description: The text '{{totalItems}} items' in paginator. When the user has opted to see all the items on a single page, this text tells the user just how many items exist.

OF.description: Preposition between focused page number input and total number of pages

STEP_LABEL.description: Label indicating which step in the process a user is on

CANCEL.description: Label for progress linear cancel done

MULTI_OVERFLOW.description: Message to display next to the count of selected items. This is used when the select control is selecting multiple options and there is not enough room to display all of the selections

NO_OPTIONS_STRING.description: Live region string for when no options are found on select or menu

SEARCH_ARIA_LABEL.message: Search in the list of options below

APPLY_BUTTON_ARIA_LABEL.description: Aria label for task drawer apply button

APPLY_BUTTON_TEXT.description: Label for task drawer apply button

RESET_BUTTON_ARIA_LABEL.description: Aria label for task drawer reset button

RESET_BUTTON_TEXT.description: Label for task drawer reset button

TOOLTIP_TEXT.description: Toolbar responsive button group overflow menu tooltip text

LINK_INDICATOR.description: Label to mark if a tree item is a link for screen reader users

FILE_TOO_BIG.description: Message to signal is bigger than the maximum limit size
FILE_TOO_BIG.message: The selected file must be smaller than {{count}} {{- unit}}

FILE_TYPE_ERROR.description: Message to signal file type is not allowed
FILE_TYPE_ERROR.message: The file type {{type}} is not allowed. The selected file must be: {{accept}}.

MAX_NUMBER_OF_FILES_PASSED.description: Error message to signal the maximum number of files have been passed
MAX_NUMBER_OF_FILES_PASSED.message_one: You can only select up to {{count}} file.
MAX_NUMBER_OF_FILES_PASSED.message_other: You can only select up to {{count}} files.

MAX_NUMBER_OF_FILES_REACHED.description: Message to signal the maximum number of files is reached
MAX_NUMBER_OF_FILES_REACHED.message: You have reached the maximum number files

UPLOAD_FAIL.description: Message to signal fail during upload
UPLOAD_FAIL.message: The selected file could not be processed - press the retry button to try again.
